page.title: 16EDUCATION SCHOOL GAMES
page.content: We play football and netball against different schools during the Autumn and Spring terms. Here is a list of all the schools we play against Alderbury, Redlynch, Nomansland, Farley, Odstock, Landford. We have football practice on Saturday mornings and Thursday afternoons during the football season. We run the mini marathon every summer. We run against local schools and also schools from Salisbury and Warminster. We play rounders and cricket during the summer. We do athletics for our own School Sports and the Small School Sports at St.Marks, Salisbury, is held annually. We have a decathlon competition at school. You get points for each event and there are gold, silver and bronze awards.
